key.name: d0
key.description: Transform type for non-languages/scripts. The ‘from’ subtag is for indicating the source instead of the destination

type.name: ascii
type.description: map as many characters to the closest ASCII character as possible

type.name: accents
type.description: map base + punctuation, etc to accented characters

type.name: from-accents
type.description: map base + punctuation, etc to accented characters

type.name: publish
type.description: map to preferred forms for publishing, such as “, ”, —

type.name: from-publish
type.description: from preferred forms for publishing, such as “, ”, —

type.name: casefold
type.description: apply Unicode case folding

type.name: lower
type.description: apply Unicode full lowercase mapping

type.name: upper
type.description: apply Unicode full uppercase mapping

type.name: title
type.description: apply Unicode full titlecase mapping

type.name: fwidth
type.description: map characters to their fullwidth equivalents

type.name: hwidth
type.description: map characters to their halfwidth equivalents

type.name: hex
type.description: map characters to hex equivalents, eg 'a' to '0061'

type.name: from-hex
type.description: map from hex, trying all formats

type.name: hex-c11
type.description: to hex, with the C11 syntax: \u0061\U0001F4D6

type.name: from-hex-c11
type.description: from hex, with the C11 syntax: \u0061\U0001F4D6

type.name: hex-css
type.description: to hex, with the CSS syntax: \61 \01F4D6

type.name: from-hex-css
type.description: from hex, with the CSS syntax: \61 \01F4D6

type.name: hex-java
type.description: to hex, with the Java syntax: \u0061\uD83D\uDCD6

type.name: from-hex-java
type.description: from hex, with the Java syntax: \u0061\uD83D\uDCD6

type.name: hex-percent
type.description: to hex, with the percent syntax: %61%F0%9F%93%96

type.name: from-hex-percent
type.description: from hex, with the percent syntax: %61%F0%9F%93%96

type.name: hex-perl
type.description: to hex, with the perl syntax: \x{61}\x{1F4D6}

type.name: from-hex-perl
type.description: from hex, with the perl syntax: \x{61}\x{1F4D6}

type.name: hex-plain
type.description: to hex, with no surrounding syntax: 0061 1F4D6

type.name: from-hex-plain
type.description: from hex, with no surrounding syntax: 0061 1F4D6

type.name: hex-unicode
type.description: to hex with the Unicode syntax: U+0061 U+1F4D6

type.name: from-hex-unicode
type.description: from hex with the Unicode syntax: U+0061 U+1F4D6

type.name: hex-xml
type.description: to hex with the xml syntax: a📖

type.name: from-hex-xml
type.description: from hex with the xml syntax: a📖

type.name: hex-xml10
type.description: to hex with the xml decimal syntax: a📖

type.name: from-hex-xml10
type.description: from hex with the xml decimal syntax: a📖

type.name: nfc
type.description: map string to the Unicode NFC format

type.name: nfd
type.description: map string to the Unicode NFD format

type.name: nfkc
type.description: map string to the Unicode NFKC format

type.name: nfkd
type.description: map string to the Unicode NFKD format

type.name: fcd
type.description: map string to the FCD format; http://unicode.org/notes/tn5

type.name: fcc
type.description: map string to the FCC format; http://unicode.org/notes/tn5

type.name: charname
type.description: map each character to its Unicode name

type.name: npinyin
type.description: map pinyin written with tones to the numeric form

type.name: from-npinyin
type.description: map the numeric form of pinyin to the tone format

type.name: prprname
type.description: transform variant for proper names

type.name: null
type.description: make no change in the string

type.name: remove
type.description: remove every character in the string
